okkay i Save game issue SOLVED

when the game tells you it's checkpointing, it's not actually saving anything. That's just the point you'll go back to when you die. When the game flashes a typewriter and says "Saving," then it's actually saving your progress. If you quit out of a game before seeing this icon, you'll have to redo everything from the last save point
